org.torpedoquery.jpa

Class Torpedo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.torpedoquery.jpa.TorpedoFunction
      • org.torpedoquery.jpa.Torpedo

  • public class Torpedo
extends TorpedoFunction
    Torpedo Query goal is to simplify how you create and maintain your HQL query. (http://docs.jboss.org/hibernate/core/3.3/reference/en/html/queryhql.html) (All following examples are extract from Torpedo's Tests cases) First add this import static org.torpedoquery.jpa.Torpedo.*; 1. Create simple select final Entity entity = from(Entity.class); org.torpedoquery.jpa.Query select = select(entity); 2. Create scalar queries final Entity entity = from(Entity.class); org.torpedoquery.jpa.Query select = select(entity.getCode()); 3. How to execute your query final Entity entity = from(Entity.class); org.torpedoquery.jpa.Query select = select(entity); List entityList = select.list(entityManager); 4. Create simple condition final Entity entity = from(Entity.class); where(entity.getCode()).eq("mycode"); org.torpedoquery.jpa.Query select = select(entity); 5. Create join on your entities final Entity entity = from(Entity.class); final SubEntity subEntity = innerJoin(entity.getSubEntities()); org.torpedoquery.jpa.Query select = select(entity.getCode(), subEntity.getName()); 6. Group your conditions Entity from = from(Entity.class); OnGoingLogicalCondition condition = condition(from.getCode()).eq("test").or(from.getCode()).eq("test2"); where(from.getName()).eq("test").and(condition); Query select = select(from);
